snippet.title: The Winter Contingency [Teaser Trailer]
snippet.description:
Here's to a great 2018 and an even better 2019!
Our website: https://project-contingency.com/

Join the community on Discord: http://discord.gg/CDgnWXq
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/ProjContingency

Music:
Fernando Pepe - Imminent (Project: Contingency OST)

Project: Contingency is a Halo fan game being worked on by fans, for the fans.

- - -

Project Contingency was created under Microsoft's "Game Content Usage Rules" using assets from Halo. It's not endorsed by Microsoft and does not reflect the views or opinions of Microsoft or anyone officially involved in producing or managing Halo. As such, it does not contribute to the official narrative of the fictional universe.

Microsoft Game Content Usage Rules: https://www.xbox.com/en-us/developers/rules
